quote: "The overall atmosphere was great, I felt really good there and the venue was super awesome. The HackTalks was definitely great and the demo expo too.“
“The experience of attending the biggest hackathon in Europe. I got a Paulig mug for free :-). And free Slush passes and other Terminal events!”
“Having the feeling of "living" together with all these people at the event. It really felt as if we were one big family and I could kinda move in. ^^”
“Everything was awesome enough, but the laser... oh man, the laser... Also, the acoustic guitars at the Yousician booth gave our team some fun times.”
“A lot of different activities. I didn't have enough time to visit them all, but I had a big variety in what to do. And a lot of cool swag, of course!”
“Great place (Helsinki in general, Wanha Satama as a venue), super cute volunteers, lots of interesting people from all around the globe.”
“I found a nice team with complete strangers and we worked well together!”
“The creative chaos, inspiring technical knowledge and access to learn about tech that I wouldn't normally have the chance to play with.”
“Terminal is the greatest idea I've ever seen on any hackaton. Thank you very much for taking care of participants after the event!”
“Felt closer to the people I worked with. People who I have never met before and will never meet again (due to different countries).”
“The environment, the atmosphere, the welcome desk and of course the time away from other stuff to hack something :)”
“Meeting all the people and feeling the excitement! It gave me motivation to push forward as a software developer. “
“The free food and drink was something I didn't expect. It was amazing to always see the snacks stand stocked. “
“Everything. Everything was awesome!”
“Creativity, innovation, meeting new people and being amazed how far have we come in the field of technology”
“The actual hacking and the people. Especially after Junction in Terminal ... so many cool new friends.”
“The people and the motivational blast of seeing everybody at a high level and doing crazy cool stuff!'”
“To meet people from all around the world and to have the opportunity to develop a project in 48h.”
“Networking with other hackers and companies! Junction really is an awesome place to meet people.”
“As a people person the karaoke for sure, but meeting other professionals in IT was pure awesome!”
“The accommodation! I've never seen a hackathon do that. It was super cool for it to happen.”
“The access to 3D-printers was very nice, and allowed us to get a physical product quickly. “
“Hacking, creating something real, community. It was my first hackathon and it was awesome!”
“The production value, the size of the event, the venue, the people! EVERYTHING!”
“Number of participants, amazing ideas, perfect organisation, free accommodation”
“The "it's mostly about having fun" mentality, so beginner felt welcome, too!”
“Night karaoke was awesome, It woke me up and gave extra hours for hacking.”
“Playing the guitar and wandering around.”
“The location was amazing. The different areas for each track were great.”
“HackTalks. (And getting to converse with the presenters afterwards.)”
“Learning new programming things. I never knew Jquery is so easy lol”
“The cool laser in the ceiling. The mentors. The people there. And especially the events after Junction where we got to meet with the startups and professionals.”
“I like how it was organized and how many people there was - It's a really BIG event.”
“It was one of the best hackthons that I went to, I met a lot of new people, new technology and new perspective. So, it was awesome.”
“Place where it was organised, support from partners and cool atmosphere”

“The atmosphere. It's just very different from any other Hackathon I've been to. Also, the whole organizing committee did awesomely. Loved the visit to Wolt's Office and also got to Slush because of you guys <3”
“In spite of having so many ppl (which was great btw) you managed to keep the site well organised and prevented it from turning into huge chaos. Kudos to you!”
“Everything :) Yep, really - I like everything you did last year! It was great organised event with great people! Thanks a lot!”
“The environment, the venue and the decoration style was amazing!!!”
“That everyone was so forthcoming and helpful.  All the ideas that were thrown around, helped to learn and make my own little projects.”
“The atmosphere and the venue. It was spectacular.”
“Atmosphere, tracks with real data to use.”
“The venue - it was incredible. Very creative atmosphere!”
“The friendly atmosphere and seeing people from worldwide.”
“Diversity of the projects, amazing organization of meals, team stands and amount of space and technologies.”
“I love that atmosphere. Many people, many ideas, many cool things”
“I really like the atmosphere when developers around the world gather and do sth cool :)”
“Atmosphere of hacking and doing something new, and learning new stuff, and chatting to people while standing on a line for pizzaburger.”
“The community was awesome and prizes were very generous”
